en.projectgame1-p-text: I developed this game as part of a creative team composed of musicians and artists, playing the role of the sole programmer. This experience allowed me to closely collaborate with other teams, learn to use Unity's tools and programming techniques, and discover my passion for game development.
en.projectgame2-p-text: This video game was developed as part of the C# for Video Games in Unity course at Platzi. It is a 2D platformer game where I worked on integrating animations, sound effects, music, a basic user interface, and focused on creating scalable code. This project helped me strengthen my skills in programming and game development.
en.presentation-text:
Hello! I'm Uriel, passionate about technology and, above all, programming.

Thanks to my studies and experience in various technological fields, I have developed a broad perspective, along with creativity, versatility, and adaptability to design innovative solutions and approach problems from different angles.

Currently, I specialize in C# and .NET, focusing on web development using ASP.NET, Blazor, and Azure.
I am a self-taught learner and enjoy applying my knowledge to real projects that allow me to keep growing professionally.
